ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six scattered rice while eating. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.3.1_0: “‘I will not scatter rice while eating,’ this is how you should train.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.4_0: One should not scatter rice while eating.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.5_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, scatters rice while eating, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.6.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.8_0: To give rise to the robe.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.11_0: if he discards rice while discarding trash;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.14_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:1.15_0: The eighth training rule is finished.
